text: Mareike Carrière (26 July 1954 - 17 March 2014) was a German actress, spokesperson and translator. She was best known for having television show appearances. She was born in Hanover, Lower Saxony, West Germany. Carrière died from cancer on 17 March 2014 in Hamburg, Germany. She was 59 years old. She was outlived by her husband and by her brother, Mathieu. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1954 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Germany Category:German movie actors Category:German stage actors Category:German television actors Category:People from Hanover Category:Radio personalities Category:German translators
title: Mareike Carrière
